summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas detailing account balances and transactions for the period from January 1, 2018, to January 31, 2018. It includes information on deposits, checks paid, service charges, and other debits, along with instructions for addressing errors in the statement.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3, St Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $532,060.99 on January 1, 2018.
A total of $58,900.00 was paid out in checks during the statement period.
The ending balance as of January 31, 2018, was $19,666.51.
There were no overdraft fees or NSF return items for the statement period.
Stewart Oldfield is the contact person for inquiries related to the account.
